definitions.definition: The handle of a tool or weapon .

main_definition: The handle of a tool or weapon .

definitions.definition: Alternative spelling of heft ( “ piece of pastureland which farm animals (chiefly cattle or sheep ) have become accustomed to; flock or group of farm animals (chiefly cattle or sheep) which have become accustomed to a particular piece of pastureland ” ) .

main_definition: ( Northern England , Scotland ) Alternative spelling of heft ( “ piece of pastureland which farm animals (chiefly cattle or sheep ) have become accustomed to; flock or group of farm animals (chiefly cattle or sheep) which have become accustomed to a particular piece of pastureland ” ) .
